original_title: Το πιάνο της πεταλούδας που έπαιζε η Γκο
overview: Gko is a teenager who expresses herself through music. She is a lesbian and in love with her best friend. Capturing the real moment with the one that is not, she is faced to find the line between the two and make her choice.
title: The butterfly's piano which was played by Gko
